name: artboard
description: Capture, remix, and share creative ideas effortlessly with Artboard Studio.
author: Frosty

scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && bun run build && electron .
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun run build:main && bun run build:renderer
scripts.build:main: bun build src/main.ts --outfile=dist/main.cjs --target=node --format=cjs --external electron --external electron-screenshots && bun build src/preload.ts --outfile=dist/preload.cjs --target=node --format=cjs --external electron
scripts.build:renderer: rm -rf dist/renderer && bun run browser:bundle && bun build src/renderer/index.html src/renderer/asset-viewer.html src/renderer/reference.html --outdir=dist/renderer --target=browser --splitting
scripts.pack:linux: rm -rf dist/renderer && bun run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage
scripts.pack:win: rm -rf dist/renderer && bun run build && electron-builder --win nsis --x64
scripts.pack:mac: rm -rf dist/renderer && bun run build && electron-builder --mac zip --x64
scripts.pack:all: rm -rf dist/renderer && bun run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage --win nsis --mac zip
scripts.pack:dir: rm -rf dist/renderer && bun run build && electron-builder --dir
